item.title: Removing Support from Zak Smith
item.description: [UPDATE February 14th, 2019: Zak has issued a statement respondingÂ here. I am not convinced to change my position below, but it introduces some doubt. I may have further thoughts as more information comes out, but I encourage you to read and evaluate it for yourself. UPDATE February 16th 2019: I reworded the bit about what it would take to change my stance to include adequate evidence that the claims were false, rather than only saying evidence of growth on Zak’s part would do it.
